thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Grand Automotive Services Gets Approval To Issue Commercial Paper, Medium-Term Notes

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Grand Automotive Services Gets Approval To Issue Commercial Paper, Medium-Term Notes

organizations.name: reuters) - china grand automotive services co ltd

text:
March 5 (Reuters) - China Grand Automotive Services Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT GETS APPROVAL TO ISSUE 9.0 BILLION YUAN ($1.42 billion) COMMERCIAL PAPER, 2.0 BILLION YUAN MEDIUM-TERM NOTES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FoRCqI ; bit.ly/2D0k38Q Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3410 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
